Did anyone see the Crocodile Hunter, S. Irwin holding his baby up while he fed a very large crocodile?
 
 Is this a form of child abuse? (to put a child into danger)

I dont think its child abuse, he wasnt actually abusing the child was he?
 
 He stupidly put the child in harms way, but he didnt abuse the child.
 
 The question asked is what is child abuse, one autumatically thinks of sexual abuse, cruelty etc.. In other words a child is being abused if it is hurt in any way, physically or mentally. You can also say brainwashing children is a type of abuse.
 
 In this case i think the baby is too young to know if it was in danger or not, however if he did that to an older child, and that child was scared of the croc, then that Would be a form of abuse.
 
 Its like wacko jacko dangling his child over the edge of a balcony, it was more reckless than abusing.
 
 You have to asses why the child was put in danger and in this case i think it was just plain stupidity.
I think it was a stupid publicity stunt, but I doubt the kid was in any real danger.

.In this case i think the baby is too young to know if it was in danger or not, however if he did that to an older child, and that child was scared of the croc, then that Would be a form of abuse.

 If he was playing russian roulette with the child would you feel the same?

If he was playing russian roulette with the child would you feel the same?

 
 Russian roulete, i think thats a bit extreme, now that would be child abuse as he would be on purposely putting the child in danger.

Russian roulete, i think thats a bit extreme, now that would be child abuse as he would be on purposely putting the child in danger.

 
 Yes,but by your definition of child abuse,the child would not know it was in danger or not,so how is it any different.
 One slip of his foot or one lunge from the croc would have had the same end result as russian roulete.
 He is taking a extreme chance with his childs life.And for what,more celebrity status?
